data.name: Divided: Soul Theft
data.detailed_description:
Case: Divided Soul Theft Ritual

Late one night, you get a frantic message from your amateur ghost hunting partner Dante… “The mansion, it’s real and it’s ALIVE with paranormal activity. GET HERE NOW!”

You immediately drive to the house to find DANTE gone, and start to receive mysterious texts from him, guiding you to solve the DIVIDED SOUL THEFT ritual!

Explore a truly haunted house, with multiple clue types: sound, picture and actions specifically designed for VR experiences.

“I wanted to design and build a game unique for VR that everyone would want to own… with the sole purpose of scaring their friends and showing off the amazing qualities of playing in VR” - Josh Crowell lead game designer.

“So after turning the corner and having HER, there in my FACE and with all the sound and music… i just ripped that headset off my head to get away! It’s funny because I WROTE the story and KNEW what was coming and still lost it. I love VR horror!” - Gary Brown Story Writer.

So gather your friends, sit down and see who can make it past the first encounter with… HER…

Who can solve the mystery first and guide the ghost hunter to success.

As an brand new indie game company we HOPE you enjoy it as much as we enjoyed making it!


- Immersive Location to Explore
- Variety of unique VR specific actions to play with
- Soundtrack designed to interact with the gamer to enhance the horror experience
- SINGULAR goal… SCARE PEOPLE

data.short_description: Discover the secrets of the Sea Captain's curse, investigate the rumors of a dark ritual and a trapped soul. Reverse the curse and break the ritual to free the souls of the occupants.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570 or Better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or Better, R9 290 or Better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or Better, Vega 56 or Better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
